page.title: 12NORTH DENES HOLIDAY CENTRE
page.content: THE NORTH DENES SEASHORE HOLIDAY CENTRE, GT. YARMOUTH Staff comprises: 30 permanent,140 cleaners and inspectors,30 bar staff, 10 Blue Coats,3 resident bands,2 Disc Jockeys,3 Lifeguards & 8 reception & booking staff. All these work under a General Manager. The site is about 1.1miles long and holds 1035 caravans. The camp has been a grear success in Yarmouth. Continuously, up to the present,new activities have been included to make it more enjoyable for the visitors. In the morning, after Breakfast, some people hire cycles and enjoy a ride around the town. The afternoon could be spenr in the 'Water World', then at night you can enjoy the Nightclubs and Discos.
